com.teleca.jamendo.util.download
类 DownloadManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.teleca.jamendo.util.download.DownloadManagerImpl
所有已实现的接口：
DownloadManager
public class DownloadManagerImpl
extends Object
implements DownloadManager

DownloadManager implementation. Using DownloadProviderDbImpl as DownloadJobs provider.

作者：
Bartosz Cichosz

构造方法摘要
DownloadManagerImpl(Context context)
           
 
方法摘要
 void deleteDownload(DownloadJob job)
          Deletes the download job and related files.
 void deregisterDownloadObserver(DownloadObserver observer)
          Removes passed object to the download observers list
 void download(PlaylistEntry playlistEntry)
          Starts download of track passed in playlistEntry
 ArrayList<DownloadJob> getAllDownloads()
          Returns all download jobs.
 ArrayList<DownloadJob> getCompletedDownloads()
          Returns completed download jobs.
 DownloadProvider getProvider()
          Returns download jobs provider.
 ArrayList<DownloadJob> getQueuedDownloads()
          Returns queued download jobs.
 String getTrackPath(PlaylistEntry playlistEntry)
          Returns path to downloaded track, or null if there is no such file.
 void notifyObservers()
          Notifies all observers that the state of the downloads has changed.
 void registerDownloadObserver(DownloadObserver observer)
          Adds passed object to the download observers list
